character.name: Dyna
description: A fire ant demolition expert. Sheï¿½s trigger-happy and eager to help out just for the sake of blowing up more things.

description.Damage: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} away for {{Damage}} damage.
description.StunDamage: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} away for {{Damage}} damage, stunning them.
description.Stun: Additionally hits parts up to {{Range}} away, stunning them.

description.Normal: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> from your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship and trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.
description.OffsetLeft: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> {{Offset}} spaces to the left of your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship and trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.
description.OffsetRight: Fire a <c=parttrait>charge</c> {{Offset}} spaces to the right of your missile bay. The charge will stick to the enemy ship and trigger when shot upon or upon collision with another charge.

TempNitro.name: Temp Nitro
TempNitro.description: The next triggered Blastwave deals {0} more damage.

Bastion.name: Bastion
Bastion.description: Whenever you trigger a <c=parttrait>charge</c>, gain {0} <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

Concussion.name: Concussion Charge
Concussion.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>concussable</c> when triggered.

Demo.name: Demo Charge
Demo.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>weak</c> when triggered.

Shatter.name: Shatter Charge
Shatter.description: Makes the ship part <c=parttrait>brittle</c> when triggered.
